title: Dwarf
description: When a dwarf with no true claim to the throne manages to take over the kingdom - an unlikely hero emerges to challenge his rule on the throne, and in the process starts a war like none ever seen in their kingdom. With magic, giants, ogres, and every other creature as an enemy, does this unlikely hero stand a chance at placing a true king back upon the throne?  Will he succeed, or will his efforts lead to an all out war that causes the falling of several kingdoms in the realm?
author: Michael Benningfield
